description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Child's History of the United States. Designed as a first book of history for schools. Illustrated by numerous anecdotes. Improved from the twenty-first edition" Author: Goodrich, Charles A. (Charles Augustus) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1447.a.16."
